name: Is Economics Even Interesting? Pt. 2: Quantitative Easing After 2008 Crisis.
description: Main Reference: Age of Easy Money | FRONTLINE PBS | Official (YouTube)

name: Is Economics Even Interesting? Pt. 1: Story of Japan
description:
Japan’s economy is a fascinating story.


Good thing school never told us about it, or I might’ve ended up hating it. In this episode, I try to break down Japan's economic journey in my own way, no jargon, no YouTube explainers, just whatever I can make sense of. Not a nerd, just thinking out loud.


Disclaimer: This is not educational content. Drop a DM if I've got something completely wrong. Would love to learn :)


Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sociallyacceptedpod/

name: Fall in Love with Marvel Cinematic Universe (The Infinity Saga)
description: Marvel movies are iconic, but what makes them so close to our heart? Let's take a walk back and see why some funny silly superheroes makes us feel so deeply about them.

name: Catching up w/ the Gen AI Circus
description:
AI has been everywhere for quite sometime now. Frankly, no one kinda care but everyone's seems to be talking about it. Similarly every tech company wants to look like they are the most futuristic company in the world and have the best AI. 

Let's catch-up with some major stuff the big tech has been upto in this rush to the future.

name: Introducing Socially Accepted
description:
Socially Accepted offers a satirical take on sounding knowledgeable in social situations. The show addresses the common struggle of feeling numb in social circles when the topic is not of someone’s interest.

The show focuses on providing interesting bits of knowledge with entertaining anecdotes, jokes and practical tips on how to navigate a discussion without a boring information overload.
